title: Windows 10 compatibility with League
body:
Hello all,

I have been putting off from upgrading my windows 7 to 10 for obviously 2 years now. This is because previously when I tried upgrading my desktop to windows 10, League was not able to be executed. So now I am wondering if you lots know by any chance whether League is now 100% compatible / would work with windows 10?

Thank you. <3

replies.body: i cant play it on windows 10 any solution please

I'm pretty certain League was playable on Windows 10 on release.  Issues can certainly arise as a result of OS changes and features, like the [Xbox Game Bar](http://www.tenforums.com/tutorials/8637-game-bar-turn-off-windows-10-a.html) with Windows or Mouse Shaker with Macs, but we make it through the obstacles.  Updating your OS is entirely your call, League should be playable either way.  I hope that helps!
I have windows 10 and I play league
